alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued November 07 at 12:22PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Blowing dust health alert in Effect for the Powder River Basin of Northeastern Wyoming in effect until 1 PM MST this afternoon... The following message is transmitted in collaboration with the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division. * WHAT...Southeast winds of 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Powder River Basin of northeastern Wyoming. * WHEN...Through 1 PM today. * IMPACTS...The strong winds will create blowing dust. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The Wyoming Air Quality Division recommends the elderly, young children, and individuals with respiratory problems avoid excessive physical exertion and minimize outdoor activities during this time. Although these people are most susceptible to health impacts, the air quality division also advises that everyone should avoid prolonged exposure to the poor air quality conditions.
